title: Efficient Business Entry Operations
description: In 2024, Rwanda achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Business Entry Pillar 3: Operational Efficiency, indicating streamlined processes for starting a business.

title: High Dispute Resolution Efficiency
description: Rwanda scored 94.63 in 2024 for the ease of resolving commercial disputes, showcasing its effective legal framework for business operations.

title: Strong Gender Representation in Parliament
description: As of 2024, 63.75% of seats in Rwanda's national parliament are held by women, reflecting significant gender equality in political representation.

title: Robust Human Resource Development
description: Rwanda's CPIA rating for building human resources was 5 in 2023, indicating strong policies for education and workforce development.

title: Effective Revenue Mobilization
description: With a CPIA rating of 4.5 in 2023, Rwanda demonstrates efficient revenue collection and fiscal management.

title: Moderate Environmental Sustainability Policies
description: Rwanda scored 4.5 in 2023 for its CPIA policy and institutions for environmental sustainability, indicating moderate effectiveness in environmental governance.

title: Challenges in Diarrhea Treatment for Children
description: In 2020, only 19.3% of children under 5 received oral rehydration and continued feeding for diarrhea, highlighting a critical area for health improvement.

title: Moderate Public Administration Quality
description: Rwanda's CPIA quality of public administration rating was 4 in 2023, suggesting room for improvement in government efficiency.

title: Balanced Social Inclusion Policies
description: With a CPIA policies for social inclusion/equity cluster average of 4.4 in 2023, Rwanda shows a commitment to equitable social policies.

title: Moderate Structural Policy Framework
description: Rwanda's CPIA structural policies cluster average was 4.17 in 2023, indicating a balanced approach to economic policy reforms.

title: Room for Improvement in Business Regulatory Environment
description: In 2023, Rwanda's CPIA business regulatory environment rating was 4.5, suggesting a solid but improvable regulatory framework for businesses.

title: Moderate Resource Allocation Efficiency
description: Rwanda's IDA resource allocation index was 4.12 in 2023, indicating moderate efficiency in resource distribution.
